ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Schema definitions and read, write and validation tools for data  formatted in accordance with the AIRR Data Representation schemas defined  by the AIRR Community <http://docs.airr-community.org>.
Schema definitions and read, write and validation tools for data  formatted in accordance with the AIRR Data Representation schemas defined  by the AIRR Community <http://docs.airr-community.org>.

name: r-airr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.6.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-airr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/airr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/airr/airr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e466ac5fd1089fe180ab6ea31d1eb2b2db24aee758b923250c47ffaa258c2251

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-readr
    - r-stringi
    - r-yaml
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-readr
    - r-stringi
    - r-yaml

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('airr')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('airr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://docs.airr-community.org
  license: CC-BY-4.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Schema definitions and read, write and validation tools for data  formatted in accordance with the AIRR Data Representation schemas defined  by the AIRR Community <http://docs.airr-community.org>.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: airr
# Type: Package
# Version: 1.2.0
# Date: 2018-08-17
# Authors@R: c(person("Jason", "Vander Heiden", role=c("aut", "cre"),  email="jason.vanderheiden@yale.edu"), person("Susanna", "Marquez", role=c("aut"),  email="susanna.marquez@yale.edu"), person("AIRR Community", role=c("cph")))
# Title: AIRR Data Representation Reference Library
# Description: Schema definitions and read, write and validation tools for data  formatted in accordance with the AIRR Data Representation schemas defined  by the AIRR Community <http://docs.airr-community.org>.
# License: CC BY 4.0
# URL: http://docs.airr-community.org
# BugReports: https://github.com/airr-community/airr-standards/issues
# LazyData: true
# BuildVignettes: true
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Encoding: UTF-8
# Depends: R (>= 3.1.2)
# Imports: methods, readr, stats, stringi, yaml
# Suggests: knitr, rmarkdown, testthat
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.0
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-08-17 17:09:02 UTC; jason
# Author: Jason Vander Heiden [aut, cre], Susanna Marquez [aut], AIRR Community [cph]
# Maintainer: Jason Vander Heiden <jason.vanderheiden@yale.edu>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-08-17 22:10:15 UTC
